name: Chess Tutor
description:
Chess Tutor has been specifically developed for new chess players. It can take you through from complete novice to a good chess player. It makes learning and developing in chess fun by a range of tutorials, mini-games and puzzles that hone skills before the full chess game is tackled. Of course, you can just play it at chess if you please!

The main features are:
>Tutor Levels
- How pieces move
- The rules of the game
- Special moves such as forks, pins, skewers and en-passant
- Practice challenges to be completed in less than 1 minute
- Puzzles
- Can you check mate in as few moves as challenged
- Ranging from beginner to advanced
- Complete puzzles to unlock more
> Minigames
- Play games against the computer
- Games for beginners and more experienced players
- Games that teach end game techniques and practice specific pieces
- Complete games to unlock more games and challenges
> Challenges
- Challenge style puzzles
- Puzzles for beginners and more advanced players
- The famous "Knight's Tour" puzzle
> Play Chess
- Computer opponent with 5 levels of difficulty
- 3 piece sets to choose from
- 3 board colours
- animated pieces
- Sounds
- Undo/take back
- Play White or Black
- Integrated opening book
